mention.text: a spokeswoman for the California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection in Sacramento

the ingredients for what could become one of the worst wildfire seasons in California 's history Right now the rains have caused everything to green up , but that can change in a few weeks , Lisa Boyd , a spokeswoman for the California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection in Sacramento , said Monday The state 's really a tinderbox this year Everyone 's going to have to be extra careful ; In Santa Clara County , the conditions are not yet extreme ; March storms probably delayed fire season until mid-June
the California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection in Sacramento
Monday The state 's really a tinderbox this year Everyone 's going to have to be extra careful
the forestry department 's Morgan Hill ranger unit
the key to how severe this fire season is
a period of temperatures in the 90s and 100s
a period of temperatures in the 90s and 100s
rural areas of the South Bay and East Bay

spokesman for the East Bay Regional Park District We have to be prepared ; Statewide , the biggest fire threat looms in the chaparral-covered coastal mountains south of Santa Barbara , where the moisture content of trees and shrubs is the lowest ever recorded for this time of year , Boyd said
the worst fire season in X years
the worst fire season in X years
the moisture content of trees and shrubs
the lowest ever recorded for this time of year
Officials at the federal Boise Interagency Fire Center in Idaho , which coordinates firefighting efforts throughout the West
The California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection advises residents of rural areas to take special precautions to protect their homes from wildfires this summer :
California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection 's
Fire Protection advises residents of rural areas to take special precautions to protect their homes from wildfires this summer
-LRB- box -RRB- Clear at least a 30-foot defensible space of brush
arrester on your chimney They are available at hardware stores
